item.title: Carmen Sandiego reboot launches March 4
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/carmen-sandiego-reboot-launches-march-4

Puzzle adventure game reboot Carmen Sandiego will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, PC via Steam), iOS, and Android on March 4, developer Gameloft announced. Pre-orders are available now in $29.99 standard and $49.99 Deluxe editions.

The Deluxe Edition includes the following additional content:

  • Anniversary caper: “Where in the World”
  • Cosmetic skin: “Classic Outfit”
  • Cosmetic skin: “Motorcycle Outfit”
  • Digital official soundtrack
  • Digital official art book

Here is an overview of the game, via Gameloft:

About

The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test whether it’s in the narrative driven main campaign or the classic mode “The Acme Files.”

Key Features

  • Become the Mastermind – For the very first time in the history of the franchise, assume the role of Carmen Sandiego herself! Dive headfirst into her world of espionage, experiencing her escapades firsthand as you outwit VILE operatives.
  • Gear Up – Carmen Sandiego wouldn’t be the legendary thief she is without tools! Glide effortlessly through the air with her trusty glider, swing from building to building with her grappling hook, and see in the dark with her night vision and thermal imaging goggles.
  • Travel the Globe – From the bustling streets of Rio de Janeiro to the majestic landmarks of Tokyo, embark on a whirlwind tour of the world’s most iconic destinations. With stunning visuals and immersive environments, every location comes to life, inviting you to explore, discover, and unravel the secrets that lie within.
  • Solve Capers – Sharpen your detective skills as you gather clues, decipher codes, and tackle a variety of mini-games to outsmart VILE’s most elusive operatives. But beware, time is of the essence! Stay sharp, think fast, and act decisively to crack safes, hack into systems, and master the art of lockpicking before it’s too late.
  • Capture VILE – Gather clues and compare them to dossiers to uncover VILE operatives. Is their hair black, red, or do they have blue eyes? Use your deductive skills to narrow down suspects. But remember, a warrant is essential before making any arrests! Will you crack the case and bring VILE to justice, or will they evade capture?

item.title: Resident Evil 4 remake sales top nine million
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/resident-evil-4-remake-sales-top-nine-million

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Xbox Series

One million units sold since October 2024.

Total sales for the Resident Evil 4 remake have surpassed nine million units worldwide, Capcom announced.

The game was last reported to have surpassed eight million units on October 16, 2024, meaning it sold an additional one million units in just under three months.

Resident Evil 4 launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam on March 24, 2023, followed by Mac, iPhone 15 Pro, and iPad on December 20, 2023.
